name: Gnomael's Vampire
description:
When the sun goes down the creatures of the shadows reign the night.

Political backstabing and mercurial moods are common in the undead society.

You are the most important vampire in the city, they call you "the Prince". This is your story.

There's a deck of events, you are trying to deplete it. Each choice will alter your four scores: BLOOD, HUMANITY, HERD and MONEY. If any of those goes below 1 or above 10 the game is over. 

Each event may add more events to the deck, try to keep it thin.
